title: Stiffs
description: A corpse will tell you a story, if you’re ready to listen.
quote: Well, like our killer, we’ll just have to take a stab at it.
altHero: an attractive woman in glasses and a low-cut shirt speaks to a colleague
alt2: the attractive female detective wears exam gloves and leans over the crime scene with her cleavage showing
alt4: the female detective takes off her glasses
